titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Preserving our past [videorecording] : the Sault Ste. Marie Tribe of Chippewa Indians / executive producer, Ben W. Baker.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Preserving our past [videorecording] : the Sault Ste. Marie Tribe of Chippewa Indians / executive producer, Ben W. Baker.

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Family -- Finding our way -- Natural healing -- The stories -- Tribal unity.

archdesc.scopecontent: Tribe elders talk about their experiences growing up, their families, traditional medicines and the economic and social status of the tribe today.

subject.term: Sault Ste. Marie Tribe of Chippewa Indians of Michigan

corpname.primary_name: Sault Ste. Marie Tribe of Chippewa Indians of Michigan
